tool.name: CreateMuskingumParameterFiles

param.name: input_drainage_line_features
param.dialogReference: The input drainage line features that compose the stream network. They must have the attributes of HydroID, NextDownID and Muskingum parameters including Musk_kfac, Musk_k, and Musk_x.

param.name: out_kfac_file
param.dialogReference: The output CSV file of the Muskingum k factor (in seconds) listed in the same order as in the stream network connecitivity file. The values are the first guesses for the parameter k. One value for each stream reach.

param.name: out_k_file
param.dialogReference: The output CSV file of Muskingum parameter k (in seconds) listed in the same order as in the stream network connecitivity file. One value for each stream reach.

param.name: out_x_file
param.dialogReference: The output CSV file of Muskingum parameter x listed in the same order as in the stream network connecitivity file. The parameter x is dimensionless. One value for each stream reach.

tool.summary: Creates the Muskingum parameter files as inputs into RAPID from the drainage line feature class.
tool.usage: • If Musk_kfac, Musk_k, and Musk_x are not in the input drainage line feature class, they can be calculated using the Calculate Muskingum Parameters model in the RAPID_Parameters toolbox.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Creates the Muskingum parameter files as inputs into RAPID from the drainage line feature class.
